job.title: Network Engineer // Cisco // DFW
job.description: Motion Recruitment is partnering up with a global leader in Infrastructure Services to help them bring on a Cisco Network Engineer. This will be a 3 month contract-to-hire position in Irving, Texas.As a Cisco Network Engineer, your scope of work will involve new virtual ASA configurations within a cloud environment for disaster recovery services.Skills & Experience3+ years of Network Administration experience (routers, switches, firewallsExperience supporting Cisco network infrastructure and devicesExpertise with Cisco Routing and Switching - Catalyst series required, Nexxus a plusExperience with Wireless LAN Controllers (WLCs, WAPs)Basic troubleshooting and supporting firewalls (Cisco ASA / Firepower; Palo Alto, Checkpoint)CCNA or CCNPThe OfferCompetitive Pay: Up to $60/hr, DOEContract Duration: 3 month contract-to-hireYou Will Receive The Following BeneftsMedical & Dental InsuranceHealth Savings Account (HSA)Paid Time OffPre-tax Commuter BenefitsPosted By: Carolyn Regimbal
